summary: A work in progress for a new accessible realm of Outland from the warcraft series by Blizzard.
descriptionHtml:
...[Updates]...........................................................

[18 June 2014]
The mod now requires Dragonborn dlc and also the Skyrim - Glowing Eyes mod from dumle35
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21142/?

Second version of the mod is now up for download. Please let me know of any missing textures or models, this is my first upload involving the use of retextured models so if anything looks weird of missing do comment and let me know!

Completed the exterior path of glory, leading up to the Hellfire Citadel, the major dungeon for this mod. The interior of the dungeon is somewhat complete, but enemies you face only lead up to half of the dungeon. Possibly another two more bosses ahead yet to be complete, but I thought to upload this version up anyways, since updates have been cold for a while.

I am currently seeking guidance from any experience modders that can provide some help about exterior world navmeshes. I don't have any problems with dungeon navmeshing but I do need alot of help with trying to get world navmesh to work. Anyone able to help please message me or reply in my help thread below:
http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1759650-how-to-auto-generate-exterior-navmesh/


...[Introduction].....................................................
This is my first mod featuring Hellfire Peninsula from the warcraft/wow series by Blizzard. Currently a WIP, I am still trying to expand the landmass while learning how to use the creation kit via videos of youtube. Everytime I learn something new I try to incorporate it into the new space.

It is called oblivion gate because I would eventually turn it into a questline in which you chase down a Mythic Dawn cultist in Skyrim where he attempts to recreate a oblivion gate to bring in dremoras into Skyrim but instead opens the portal into Outland. The dragonborn must then venture into the new realm to find a way to hopefully close the portal. Lore unfriendly, but I enjoy the twist ;)

I will upload the file only when its half playable, this will take a while, so check don't bother checking anytime soon :(

To Do's- Progress Tracking
